publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4510 Cathy Jamieson: The Draft Management of Offenders etc. (Scotland) Act 2005 (Supplementary Provisions) Order 2006—That the Justice 2 Committee recommends that the draft Management of Offenders etc. (Scotland) Act 2005 (Supplementary Provisions) Order 2006 be approved. Supported by: Hugh Henry*

S2M-4510 Cathy Jamieson: The Draft Management of Offenders etc. (Scotland) Act 2005 (Supplementary Provisions) Order 2006—That the Justice 2 Committee recommends that the draft Management of Offenders etc. (Scotland) Act 2005 (Supplementary Provisions) Order 2006 be approved. Supported by: Hugh Henry
